• Team Roster

    • rosterData => { // function generates manager card const displayManager = manager => { return `
  • ${manager.getName()}
    ${manager.getRole()}
    ID: ${manager.getID()}
    ID: ${manager.getOffice()}
    Email: ${manager.getEmail}
    • ` }; // function generates engineer card const displayEngineer = engineerData => { engineerData.forEach(engineer => { return `
  • ${engineer.getName()}
    ${engineer.getRole()}
    ID: ${engineer.getID()}
    Email: ${engineer.getEmail} GitHub Username: ${engineer.getGithub}
    • ` }) }; // function generates intern card const displayIntern = internData => { internData.forEach(intern => { return `
  • ${intern.getName()}
    ${intern.getRole()}
    ID: ${intern.getID()}
    ${intern.getSchool()}
    Email: ${intern.getEmail}
    • ` }) }; }
